meta.name: description
meta.content: QDA - Quaker Digital Academy - is an Ohio Non-Profit Online School available to all Ohio Students. Online Education for Ohio students in grade K-12. Tuition is free. Offices: New Phila, Ohio. Berlin, Ohio. East Liverpool, Ohio. Steubenville, Ohio.

meta.name: generator
meta.title: QDA: An Ohio K-12 Public Online School

p.span: To see available resources to contact QDA, please click here.

hr.p:
As COVID-19 / Coronavirus continues to evolve and new information comes out each day, we will continue to provide you updates. The education, safety, and well-being of our students, staff, families, and our community are our first priority. The following is information to keep you up-to-date:
→ QDA operations for student learning will remain the same. Students are expected to continue working.
→ Our office staff is still available via phone, email, and video conferencing.
→For the safety of our staff, there will be no in-person activities.
→Testing Update:
→ All testing has been postponed until further notice.
→ We will update you as soon as information is available.

p.span: We will continue to be in touch via phone and email with important information. Parents are encouraged to call their instructional supervisor or main QDA phone number with questions, device issues, or student assistance:
Thank you for your patience, understanding, and support.

-QDA Staff
IS Staff Directory can be found here.

div.h3: The Freedom to Learn from Anywhere!

img.alt: The Freedom to Learn from Anywhere!
The Freedom to Learn from Anywhere!

div.span: Founded in 2003, QDA is a non-profit, public online school that offers K-12 students across the state of Ohio the opportunity to have access to a cutting edge online education at no cost.
QDA offers a variety of exceptional and accredited curricular options to meet the individual unique needs of a student.

div.div:
At QDA we want to ensure our students and their families get the support they need when they need it. For this reason we have four offices located around the State of Ohio staffed by local members of the community.
When you contact QDA you reach the same dedicated staff so we can quickly assist you. No Automation. No Outsourced Management. No out-of-state technical support.
Give us a call toll free at 1-866-968-7032 or find your party using our staff directory below:
Staff Directory

div.span: Copyright © 2020. QDA: An Ohio K-12 Online School.

p.span: QDA (Quaker Digital Academy) is K-12 public school for Ohio students. QDA is an Ohio non-profit online school with offices in New Philadelphia, Berlin, East Liverpool, and Steubenville. QDA provides students with a computer system, tutoring services, an academic coach, and access to hundreds of online courses. QDA is a tuition free school. Contact QDA today at 1-866-968-7032 or complete an information request to learn more about QDA.
